titleStmt.title: Rombus the moderator: or, The King restored. From whence followes the arraignment of seven incomparable malefactors : with their faults, confessions, and Astræas severe sentence, Rombus his qualifications : the prisoners reprieves, and severall punishments. A certain strange accidentall, aliàs, his Excellenscey [sic] begeting, and a presage of his fortune, with other remarkable passages. ...

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
